30% Off Corsair TC100 Relaxed Gaming Chair

Corsair TC100 Relaxed Gaming Chair

The TC100 Relaxed series is Corsair's least expensive gaming chair. It offers a wider seat and minimal bolstering on the sides to fit a greater range of body sizes than the other models. This gaming chair can hold up to 264lbs, accommodate heights up to 6' 2" tall, and features a height adjustment range of 45-65cm (21.7–25.5"). Best Buy's model is upholstered in easy to clean leatherette. Other notable features includes a headrest and lumbar pillow that comes standard, 160-degree reclinability, and 2D adjustable armrests. It's backed by a two-year warranty. If you don't want to spend $400+ or the best gaming chair, then the TC100 Relaxed is seriously a gaming chair worth consideration.
